title: Audit Reveals Vast Scale Of VA Waitlist Issues
teaser: Before former Veterans Affairs Secretary Eric Shinseki stepped down, he ordered an audit of the VA system, hoping to find how many hospitals were lying about wait times. The audit found that approximately 100,000 veterans are waiting too long for care at the VA.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
